title: Business Leaders Urge Senate to Pass Gun Legislation in Letter
text:
Chief executives of dozens of companies ranging from Levi Strauss LEVI 2.59% & Co. to Uber Technologies Inc. UBER 1.46% sent a letter to members of the Senate asking them to pass new legislation to prevent gun violence.

The letter asks Senators to pass legislation requiring background checks on gun sales and said failing to take action on the issue is unacceptable, a copy of the letter received by The Wall Street Journal shows.
